Text:
If you download this file, please help seed for a while after you're done, or do me a favor and make a decently compressed version to share too.

These raw files are tough to share on a one-to-one basis. We need to create a bigger swarm of people to share the bandwidth.
... and to speed up download speed, not the least :-)

A .MP4 preview version of this interview is available from the Internet Archive :

http://www.archive.org/details/LawrenceLessig_Interview_10_06_2006
